question: The team of which among the following institution of Uttar Pradesh won the “AIAA Neil Armstrong Best Design Award”?
option2: KIET Group of Institutions in Ghaziabad
answer: KIET Group of Institutions in Ghaziabad
explanation: “AIAA Neil Armstrong Best Design Award” was given to the team of KIET Group of Institutions in Ghaziabad. The award recognizes systems best designed to meet the Rover Challenge performance requirements.
